sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-config-provider :theme="theme">
    <n-space>
      <n-button @click="theme = darkTheme">深色</n-button>
      <n-button @click="theme = null">浅色</n-button>
    </n-space>
    <n-global-style />
    <n-result status="403" title="503 服务器娘挂了哦" description="要不要听听歌呢">
      <template #footer>
        <n-button>找点乐子吧</n-button>
      </template>
    </n-result>
  </n-config-provider>
</template>
<script>
import { darkTheme } from "naive-ui";
import { ref } from 'vue';

export default {
  setup() {
    return {
      darkTheme,
      theme: ref(null)
    };
  },
};
</script>
